text:
Sushmita Sen Attends A Friend's Wedding With Boyfriend Rohman Shawl & The Pictures Are Dreamy!
Sushmita Sen Attends A Friend's Wedding With Boyfriend Rohman Shawl & The Pictures Are Dreamy!
When you attend your best friend's wedding, you know it'll be all about love, joy and lots of photographs. For Sushmita Sen, her best friend Fatima Dsouza’s wedding was exactly that.
Sush attended the catholic wedding with her boyfriend Rohman Shawl and daughter Alisah and it was a perfect outing for the whole family. Sushmita Sen surely believes in archiving memories of her life and sharing it with her fans on social media and this wedding was one such special occasion.
Just a few days ago, she confirmed that she's dating Rohman Shawl and people have flooded her photographs with congratulatory messages.
Don't Miss 343 SHARES 594 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
She shared pictures and videos from the wedding and they radiate happiness and love! One of the pictures on her account was captioned as:
“#this. Alisah practicing her #flowergirl walk with Rooh @rohmanshawl #clintwedsfatima #mountmarychurch #godislove #duggadugga. I love you guys!!! #blessed.”
While Rohman and Sush looked perfect, it was daughter Alisah who stole the limelight with her cute and adorable antics while practicing her flower girl walk. Have a look.
Instagram
Have a look at the pictures and videos.
title: Sushmita Sen Attends A Friend's Wedding With Boyfriend Rohman Shawl & The Pictures Are Dreamy!

Sushmita Sen surely believes in archiving memories of her life and sharing it with her fans on social media and this wedding was one such special occasion.
